description: This is an easy recipe to adjust to what you have in the fridge. It's quick and tasty making it the perfect weekday dinner.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Zucchini,High protein,Soy free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Creamy Garlic Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut up chicken in approximately 2 cm pieces.
Brown the chicken cooking it halfway through. Set aside.
Fry up vegetables till they are browned and softened.
Add garlic paste to the vegetables and stir through.
Add chicken to the pan and stir through.

HowToTip.tipText: Serve with pasta, rice or mashed potatoes if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cream and give a thorough stir. Add herbs and spices according to taste. Let it simmer for approximately 10 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the cream has reached your preferred consistency. Stir occasionally.
